entries.name: bin_dir
entries.desc: The directory a gem's executables will be installed into

entries.name: gem_home
entries.desc: The gem repository the gem will be installed into

entries.name: spec
entries.desc: The Gem::Specification for the gem being uninstalled, only set during uninstall_gem

entries.name: new(gem, options = {})
entries.desc: Constructs an uninstaller that will uninstall gem

entries.name: remove(spec)
entries.desc: the spec of the gem to be uninstalled

entries.name: remove_executables(spec)
entries.desc: Removes installed executables and batch files (windows only) for gemspec.

entries.name: uninstall()
entries.desc: Performs the uninstall of the gem.  This removes the spec, the Gem directory, and the cached .gem file.
